nodes.text: The bageraset was a large, herbivorous herd animal native to Corellia. It was a distant cousin of the Naboo Falumpaset.
Bageraset meat was comestible. The cookbook Essential Cooking Skills detailed how to best cook that meat.
Bagerasets appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
